summary: After connecting with the shy Madeline, a jazz trumpeter embarks on a quest for a more gregarious paramour, but through a series of twists and turns punctuated by an original score, the two lovers seem destined to be together.
cast: Jason Palmer|Desiree Garcia|Sandha Khin|Karen Adelman|Suzanne Bouffard|Kelly Burk|Anna Chazelle|Bernard Chazelle|Gonzalo Digenio|Frank Garvin|Eli Gerstenlauer|Carolyn Glicklich|Greg|Keith Gross-Hill|Kevin Harris|Andre Hayward|Daniel the Juggler|Kelly Kaleta|Maureen McCarthy|Vera Meyer|Beverly Palmer|Sharee Palmer|Tj Palmer|Zerek Palmer|Joe Della Penna|Vanessa Pope|Alma Prelec|Jerry Quinn|Willie Rodriguez|Chris Rowse|Elizabeth Tingue|Eddie Wakes|Damien Chazelle
keywords: written by director|produced by director|long title|character name in title
title: Guy and Madeline on a Park Bench
